content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is about the payment of costs and started on january 11 2016 ending on may 22 2017 the final resolution involves dividing goods between exspouses including three properties worth 70000 eur the plaintiff will receive half the value of all three properties while the defendants will receive half of one property and a payment of 30000 eur the decision is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act and the court settlement is confidential no translation of the document is available
